entry.title: BLOWING SNOW ADVISORY, Dempster (Highway)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:01 a.m. MST Wednesday 12 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A few flurries. Temperature steady near minus 10.
entry.summary: Flurries. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming east 20 near noon. Temperature steady near minus 10. Wind chill near minus 19. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MST Wednesday 12 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few flurries. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local blowing snow late this evening and overnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind east 20 km/h except 60 gusting to 80 near the Richardson mountains late this evening and overnight. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MST Wednesday 12 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A few flurries. Temperature steady near minus 17.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local blowing snow. Wind east 20 km/h except 60 gusting to 80 near the Richardson mountains. Temperature steady near minus 17. Wind chill near minus 28. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MST Wednesday 12 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Flurries. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local blowing snow. Low minus 17. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MST Wednesday 12 April 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 15. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Local blowing snow. High minus 15. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MST Wednesday 12 April 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Cloudy. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Low minus 17. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MST Wednesday 12 April 2023
